# string

**Instance Property**

The text to be rendered by the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
var string: Any? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The text must be an instance of `NSString` or `NSAttributedString`. Defaults to `nil`.

## Related Documentation

- **Core Animation Programming Guide**
